name.baseName: Farmland remediation ; In-situ remediation ; Solidification/stabilization ; Construction preparation ; Chemical transportation
农田修复;原位修复;钝化修复;施工准备;药剂运输

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset represents the stabilization and solidification preparation phase for the remediation of heavy metal contaminated farmland soil in Nujiang, Yunnan Province, China. The process includes the transportation of chemicals for treating a 16-hectare farmland contaminated by lead and zinc mining to reduce the bioavailable concentrations of cadmium (Cd) and lead (Pb) in crops by 100% and decrease the effective state concentration of Cd and Pb in the soil by more than 70%. This data set is appropriate for scenarios where heavy metal-contaminated agricultural lands require remediation to meet safety standards for crop production.
稳定化修复施工准备阶段，药剂运输过程。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 云南省怒江州受铅锌矿污染某耕地土壤 污染修复工程

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents the stabilization and solidification preparation phase for the remediation of heavy metal contaminated farmland soil in Nujiang, Yunnan Province, China. The process includes the transportation of chemicals for treating a 16-hectare farmland contaminated by lead and zinc mining to reduce the bioavailable concentrations of cadmium (Cd) and lead (Pb) in crops by 100% and decrease the effective state concentration of Cd and Pb in the soil by more than 70%. This data set is appropriate for scenarios where heavy metal-contaminated agricultural lands require remediation to meet safety standards for crop production.
本数据集代表了中国云南省怒江州重金属污染农田土壤的稳定化修复施工准备阶段。该过程包括运输化学药剂，用以处理16公顷因铅锌矿开采而受到污染的农田，实现农作物中镉（Cd）和铅（Pb）含量100％达到安全标准，以及减少土壤有效态Cd和Pb浓度超过70%。该数据集适用于需要修复的重金属污染农用地，以满足作物生产的安全标准的场景。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 肖萌 et al. 农田污染钝化修复环境影响定量评估方法与案例分析. 中国环境科学 43, 3571–3581 (2023).
肖萌 et al. 农田污染钝化修复环境影响定量评估方法与案例分析. 中国环境科学 43, 3571–3581 (2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When applying this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), attention should be paid to the geographical specificity and the scale of the process. This data set reflects a localized situation and should be used when assessing similar contexts regarding soil contamination and treatment efficacy in a comparable geographical area. Users should carefully consider the boundary conditions of the dataset such as the type of contaminated land, the extent of contamination, and the specific treatment methods employed. The functional unit is the remediation of 16 hectares of land; data extrapolation to larger areas should be done with caution and consideration of scale effects. Ensure that any extrapolation aligns with the LCA's goal and scope and that results are interpreted accordingly.
在应用此数据集进行整个生命周期评估（LCA）时，应关注过程的地理特异性和规模。该数据集反映了一个局部情况，应当在评估相似的土壤污染与治疗效果的地理区域中使用。使用者应该详细考虑数据集的边界条件，如污染土地的类型、污染程度以及采用的具体治疗方法。功能单元为修复16公顷土地；对更大面积进行数据外推时应谨慎，并须考虑规模效应。确保任何外推与LCA的目标和范围一致，并且相应地解释结果。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site
